messages.body: $AAPL Samsung to slash OLED panel output amid iPhone X slump https://asia.nikkei.com/Business/AC/Samsung-to-slash-OLED-panel-output-amid-iPhone-X-slump

links.title: Samsung to slash OLED panel output amid iPhone X slump- Nikkei Asian Review
links.description: SEOUL -- Samsung Electronics will significantly lower the facility utilization rate at its OLED panel plant in response to customer Apple's decision to cut production of the iPhone X amid weak demand. Samsung Display now plans to manufacture organic light-emitting diode panels for 20 million iPhones or less at the South Chungcheong Province site in the January-March quarter.

links.title: A Bull Pounds the Table on Apple Inc. (AAPL), A Bear Lifts Price Target on Tesla Inc (TSLA) Stock - Smarter Analyst
links.description: Guggenheim analyst Rob Cihra is out pounding the table on Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:), betting that its "Other Product" accessories segment of the AAPL Watch, Airpods, and HomePod could yield $22 billion by next year. With full bullish confidence ahead, the analyst reiterates a Buy rating on AAPL stock with a $215 price target, which implies a just under 25% upside from current levels.

Stocks Bounce But Cycles May Keep Things In Check $SPY $AAPL $WFC $SPX https://goo.gl/951aaA

links.title: Stocks Bounce But Cycles May Keep Things In Check
links.description: Summary: * The S&P 500 moved higher last week, rising by 4.3%. * The Consumer Price Index (CPI) rose faster than expected in January, however this did not push equities lower, as many expected it would. * Our projection this week is for stocks to move lower, perhaps bouncing off their support zone.
